caption.center: In re Kenneth W. MATTHEWS v. STATE.

opinion.posture: Certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals.
opinion.attorneys:
H. Kenneth Wilkes, Opelika, for petitioner.
No appearance for the State.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Kenneth W. Matthews for Certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that Court in Matthews v. State, 58 Ala. App. ___,335 So.2d 217.
WRIT DENIED.
HEFLIN, C.J., and BLOODWORTH, FAULKNER and EMBRY, JJ., concur.
